scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); ['./netlify/functions/views', './public/views'].forEach(dir => { if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) fs.mkdirSync(dir, {recursive: true}); fs.readdirSync('./views').forEach(file => fs.copyFileSync(path.join('./views', file), path.join(dir, file))); }); console.log('Views copied to both function and public directories');"
